metadata.title: CVE-2022-21385 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A flaw in net_rds_alloc_sgs() in Oracle Linux kernels allows unprivilegedlocal users to crash the machine. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 6.2 (Availabilityimpacts). CVSS Vector (CVSS:3.1/AV:L/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:H)

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
